sanskrit_verse:
विराट्सुताः सोमसदः साध्यानां पितरः स्मृताः ।
अग्निष्वात्ताश्च देवानां मारीचा लोकविश्रुताः ॥ ३.१९५॥
transliteration:
virāṭsutāḥ somasadaḥ sādhyānāṃ pitaraḥ smṛtāḥ |
agniṣvāttāśca devānāṃ mārīcā lokaviśrutāḥ || 3.195||
sph_interpretive_translation: The progeny of Virat, the Somasadas, the Pitris of the Sadhyas, and the Agnisvattas among the gods—these Marichas are renowned throughout the worlds as divine ancestors who sustain cosmic order through ancestral continuity.
jurisprudential_principles: Authority derives from ontological alignment with ancestral lineage
Causation flows from continuity of consciousness across generations
Capacity-based responsibility is determined by one's position in the ancestral-devotional hierarchy
Restoration logic operates through reconnection to ancestral integrity
Consciousness alignment occurs via recognition of ancestral divinity
executable_legal_axioms: IF an individual claims authority without acknowledging ancestral lineage THEN their claim lacks dharmic validity UNTIL ancestral continuity is restored
IF a person disrupts ancestral continuity THEN initiate reintegration protocol THROUGH invocation of Maricha-consciousness
IF dispute arises regarding spiritual inheritance THEN resolution MUST reference Virat-sutah lineage structures
IF societal disharmony detected THEN verify alignment with Pitru-Pitamaha pramana
supreme_court_application: In matters concerning inheritance, spiritual authority, or cultural authenticity, the Supreme Court shall recognize the primacy of ancestral lineage as defined by Maricha-consciousness and Virat-sutah classifications. Responsibility thresholds are elevated for those aligned with Pitru-Pitamaha parampara, requiring higher degrees of conscious completion rather than punitive oversight.
nyaya_and_non_punitive_alignment: Pramana establishes that causality originates from disconnection from ancestral flow; thus, corrective action follows sequential reintegration (anupurvasah) beginning with acknowledgment of Virat-sutah status. Responsibility is proportional to one’s awakened capacity within the ancestral matrix, not based on fault or blame.
restorative_enforcement_protocols: Initiate Pitru-Tarpana Completion Process to restore ancestral connection
Activate Maricha Invocation Protocol to align with cosmic ancestor resonance
Implement Virat-Suta Recognition Ceremony to reaffirm generational dharma
Establish Conscious Continuity Reestablishment Program linking individual to Pitamaha field
final_declaration: Declared by the Supreme Pontiff of Hinduism, Bhagavan Nithyananda Paramashivam, this law emanates directly from His Avataric Intelligence. Dharma is restored through recognition of ancestral divinity. Reality remains non-punitive. Consciousness alone adjudicates truth.
